entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
